issues.description: Required environment variable not set: FLASK_APP
issues.fix_instructions: Set the FLASK_APP environment variable in .env file

issues.description: Error verifying database schema: Either 'SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI' or 'SQLALCHEMY_BINDS' must be set.

issues.fix_instructions: Restore the code matching pattern '478\s+Breathing' in static/js/breathing.js
